name: MakeDyadicVectors
description: MakeDyadicVectors, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: MakeDyadicVectors).

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A unicode string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Output
inputs.description: A file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Perc
inputs.description: A float. The {perc}% angle of the output cone of uncertainty (output will be in degrees).

inputs.name: Phi vol
inputs.description: An existing file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Theta vol
inputs.description: An existing file name. No description provided.

output-files.name: Dispersion
output-files.description: An existing file name. No description provided.

output-files.name: Dyads
output-files.description: An existing file name. No description provided.
